message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper proposes a novel data augmentation method for labeled sentences using BERT, a popular language model. The paper focuses on improving the performance of deep neural network models for text classification tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper involves training a deep bidirectional language model, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also mentions the use of convolutional or recurrent neural networks, which are commonly used in the sub-categories of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition).
